name: Dissonance Dispute
description:
Dissonance Dispute is a movement platformer where you use evasion to traverse the castle and defeat the 3 bosses that are in the game. Use the power of Vaporwave to traverse the Metal Castle and beat the Metal King!

This game was made in 2019 and is one of my first games I've made. The game is unfinished and have bugs and other stuff but I am very proud of it, so here it is!

Controls:

A + D to move left and right

M + any direction to Dash.

Spacebar to jump or wall jump

Leo Wognum - Art, Programming, Music & Game Design

Ludvig Köhn - Art, Programming & Game Design

Theo Hubner Sallis - Programming & Game Design
